thread.title: Doctors reveal the most bizzare issue they have seen a patient trying to hide
thread.title_full: Doctors reveal the most bizzare issue they have seen a patient trying to hide

author: Team Social
title: Doctors reveal the most bizzare issue they have seen a patient trying to hide
text:
February 23, 2017, 2:26 pm IST Team Social in Everything Social | Lifestyle | TOI 
While most people visit the doctor with the intention to get their medical problem solved, some however, just land up at the doctors with no intention of revealing their problems while the poor doctor tries to make head or tail of ‘what exactly is the issue’. 
A viral Reddit thread reveals the most bizzare and weird problems patients try to mask. And trust us, they are out of this world. 
So we went a step ahead and compiled a list for you. Take a look. 
It’s mostly about sex Comment from discussion Doctors of Reddit, what is the most bizarre issue you’ve seen a patient trying to hide or mask? . 
If she can have a turtle, sure she can have a baby! Comment from discussion Doctors of Reddit, what is the most bizarre issue you’ve seen a patient trying to hide or mask? . 
Because you cannot refuse the ‘Devil’ Comment from discussion Doctors of Reddit, what is the most bizarre issue you’ve seen a patient trying to hide or mask? . Eww…that must be painful! Comment from discussion Doctors of Reddit, what is the most bizarre issue you’ve seen a patient trying to hide or mask? . 
The stork dropped it in her belly Comment from discussion Doctors of Reddit, what is the most bizarre issue you’ve seen a patient trying to hide or mask? . 
If only magic could solve problem! DISCLAIMER : Views expressed above are the author's own. Author
